entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Which fluent builder APIs can I safely omit when not using code generation or migrations? #26792
  • RelationalConnection.Close calls async function #26790
  • [Q] SqlServerConventionSetBuilder and valueGenerationConvention [SqlServerValueGenerationConvention] #26789
  • Entity's state should be modified if entity's owned object is modified. #26783
  • Migrations bundle EF core 6 error #26782
  • Add more DateTimeOffset member translations #26781
  • Use SQL Server datetime2 functions when translating DateTime.Now and DateTime.UtcNow #26780
  • Many To Many Exception when adding and removing same entity #26779

Closed

  • Use implicit usings #26773
    7.0.0
  • Use file scoped namespaces #26772
    7.0.0
  • Build started... Build succeeded. System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to resolve service for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Diagnostics.IDiagnosticsLogger`1[Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbLoggerCategory+Scaffolding]' while attempting to activate 'MySql.EntityFrameworkCore.Scaffolding.Internal.MySQLDatabaseModelFactory'. #26777
  • Add-Migration : Exception calling "Start" with "1" argument(s): "The specified executable is not a valid application for this OS platform." #26770

PullRequests

Created

  • Suppress warnings on uninitialized DbSet properties #26795
  • [release/2.1] Move off expiring machine pools #26794
    area-infrastructure
  • Call sync connection close instead of async #26793
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_sqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26788
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26787
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26786
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26785
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26784
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Use file-scoped namespaces and implicit usings in tests #26778

Updated

  • Don't discover navigations to Dictionary<> and non-owned STETs #26769
  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • [6.0.x] Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
    Servicing-consider
  • Log warning when credentials used for reverse enigineering does not have view definition rights #26776
